title: Feature Encoding
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Converting text/categories into numbers (Computers only understand numbers). 
- **Label Encoding**: Apple=1, Banana=2. (Implies order, bad for Nominal).
- **One-Hot**: Apple=[1,0], Banana=[0,1]. (Increases dimensions, good for Nominal).

common_mistakes.correction: Model will think Banana (2) > Apple (1). Use One-Hot.

interview_questions.question: What is the Dummy Variable Trap?
interview_questions.answer: Multicollinearity caused by including all dummy columns. Drop first column (n-1 optimized).
